New Records: Cleveland Guardians scored five runs before recording an out in a playoff game
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run home run in the first inning
Tyler Holton faced four hitters without recording an out in the first inning
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said, 'When they punch you with five in the first, it's hard to overcome'
Guardians manager Stephen Vogt said, 'We don't just blindly play the numbers. We use our judgment in-game.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game started with a critical error by third baseman Zach McKinstry that led to a run with José Ramírez at the plate
The field was watered differently for the game compared to the warm-up session, affecting the ball hops
